traits.name: (Defender) You Can’t Leave
traits.detail: Targets always provoke opportunity attacks, even if they take the Disengage action before leaving your reach. In addition, when you hit with an opportunity attack, the target’s speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Talieus casts an at-will spell, and then makes two Hammer attacks.

actions.name: Hammer
actions.detail: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ [damage/4-0.5, d12] bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Searing Smite (At-Will)
actions.detail: The next successful melee attack that Talieus makes deals an additional 7d6 fire damage.

actions.name: Thunderwave (At-Will)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 15' cube must make a [dc-primary] STR save or be pushed back 15' and take [damage/4+1.5, d6] thunder damage (half damage on save).

actions.name: Arc Lightning (At-Will)
actions.detail: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ 3d8 lightning damage, and Talieus can repeat this attack against another target within 30' of the first target.

actions.name: Storm Rune (1/Day)
actions.detail: Each creature within 30' of Talieus must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take [3*damage/4, d6] thunder damage (half damage on save). Then, up to three targets within 120' of Talieus must make [dc-primary] DEX saves or take [damage/2+2, d8] lightning damage.
